One day, when Sanpei takes a nap whilst floating down the river on a makeshift raft, he is mistaken for a Kappa and gets pulled underwater by a group of 'fellow' Kappa that are worried about him being spotted by humans, before whisking Sanpei away to the underwater Kingdom of the Kappa.

Upon arrival, Sanpei is soon discovered to actually be a human and is immediately is sentenced to execution.
Realizing the situation he's in, Sanpei somehow manages to convince the Kappa elders that Human civilization is much more advanced and that they could learn a great deal from the humans should they allow him to live. Unable to trust Sanpei completely, the Kappa Elder removes Sanpei's bellybutton (as this is where they believe his soul to be located) as a guarantee before sending him back to the Human world, escorted by a young Kappa "exchange student" that strikes a frightening resemblance to Sanpei.

Hohoko, a book lover, and Yahiro, a music fanatic, write messages to each other in the school library, where private conversation is forbidden, and thereby gradually get to know each other. title: Datebashira
synopsis:
Datebashira is a series of stories about the Sengoku era in Japan. However, unlike most textbooks and historical manga, Datebashira does not focus on the Shogun or famous figures in history. Instead, it brings to light the untold stories of the things surrounding these famous figures. For example, one story tells about the role of how beautiful young men were always accompanying the shoguns into battle. As women were not allowed into a battle zone, the warlords would use these teenage boys to satisfy their sexual urges.

A different chapter tells the history of the wives of the Shoguns and focuses on the female role in the Sengoku era. As young women were forced into arranged marriages, usually as peace offerings or spies, their husbands usually die in battle at a very early age, as it was the era of war. Datebashira discusses the idea of remarriage for these women and if they were really in love or were playing the role of a wife.

Datebashira takes a different perspective at one of Japan's most talked about era and even though it is informative, you never get the feeling of a lecture. The beautiful artwork, splash of comedy and the untold, yet interesting historical information really keeps the reader glued onto the pages.

title: Amatsu Soranaru

The following day her company's CEO returns the notebook and promptly asks her "Would you like to go out with me?". The relationship builds  more than Kiyo ever thought, and she learns more about love and her CEO that she had ever anticipated.

What will happen between these two? Will he change her logical perspective on love and teach her how amazing it really can be?

synopsis:
Sou Tsukishiro chose to enter the same high school as his childhood friend Kashiwagi, for whom he secretly has feelings for. He happily spends each day at school with her, despite knowing that she chose to go to this school to chase after her first and current love interest.

Sou's eyes possess a special ability inherited from his vampire father, called "Temptation." Its power allows the user to make anyone their "captive" just by making eye contact with them. These "captives" will do anything for their "master" no matter how dangerous or unfavorable it is. Sou sealed this power because it led to the death of his mother, but it unexpectedly ends up activating. A story of a pure, dark love twisted by the power to control the hearts of others.

(Source: MU)

title: Maison de Beauties

alternative_titles.ja: メゾン・ド・ビューティーズ

synopsis:
A low-price, high-quality apartment in the metropolitan area of Tokyo is nothing short of a miracle! It exists, but there's a catch—tenants must be good-looking and pass an interview by the landlord!? This is a love comedy about what happens when beautiful people are all gathered under one roof!

(Source: ShoujoMagic)

title: Boku no Goshujinsama☆ - As You Wish

synonyms: Boku no Goshujin-sama☆ - As You Wish
alternative_titles.ja: ボクのご主人様☆ ~AS YOU WISH~

synopsis:
1. Boku no Goshujin-sama ~As You Wish~
2. Futari de Poka-Poka
3. Waruiko na Boku
4. Ichiban no Okusuri
5-7. Kieta Kioku
8. Shiawase Fuusen
9. Kyoufu Cobra-kan (Cobra Mansion of Terror)

title: Gattendou Tenmatsuki
synopsis:
In order to take care of his younger brother, Nozomi runs the Gattendou (sort of a jack of all trades) convenient store. For his most recent job he'll be acting as the body double for a yakuza's son, therefore he'll be protected closely by a bodyguard. But the bodyguard, Kusaka Yamato, fervently pursues him all while claiming he loves Nozomi. Nozomi has always earned a living himself for his and his brothers sake, but perhaps it wouldnt be so bad to rely on others every so often.

(Source: MU)

title: Musubu to Hon.
synopsis:
Musubu is a boy who can hear the voices of books. One day, he meets a children's book who wants to go back to someone named Hana, and the search begins. Will he be able to fulfill the book’s request...?

(Source: Yen Press)

alternative_titles.ja: 聖剣士さまの魔剣ちゃん

title: Sensei datte Yarashii Koto shitai

alternative_titles.ja: センセーだってやらしいことしたい

synopsis:
After his dream of becoming a professional musician was crushed, Ren was forced to work at the kindergarten run by his parents. Ren's unmotivated and lazy personality clashes with that of the super serious teacher Kiichi, whom he watches closely every day. However, Kiichi's straightforward kindness and purity creates new and unique feelings...

(Source: Kaiohsha, translated)

title: Jigoku no Sata mo Kin○ Shidai?

synonyms: Balls are The Best Lawyer in Hell

title: Mado
synopsis: In front of a strange mansion a boy gets caught up in a dare. He must yell "Ghost" from the top of his lungs and have the girl in the mansion close the window. Many years has passed since his childhood and he recalls the mystery of the girl by the mansion.

title: Guild no Uketsukejou desu ga, Zangyou wa Iya nanode Boss wo Solo Toubatsu Shiyou to Omoimasu

alternative_titles.en: I May Be a Guild Receptionist, but I'll Solo Any Boss to Clock Out on Time
alternative_titles.ja: ギルドの受付嬢ですが、残業は嫌なのでボスをソロ討伐しようと思います

synopsis:
Alina Clover signed up to be a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild thinking it would be her ticket to the good life. Unfortunately, her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina takes to beating down monsters herself to solve the problem! Now she just needs to keep her activities a secret...

(Source: Yen Press)

title: Orebushi
synopsis:
Following the life of the recent high school graduate, Ashika Kouji, this story depicts the life of a shy and naive man moving to the big city to become an enka singer. Leaving his only family, his grandmother, in his home town in Aomori, he now has to survive a life in Tokyo by himself. He realizes his true talent as he makes new friends and faces new challenges in his new life.
Credit: https://www.mangaupdates.com/series.html?id=33623

title: Shizuku Yakata Goraiten
synopsis: None

title: Sekai no Owari no Mahoutsukai

synonyms: The Witch at the End of the World Complete Edition
alternative_titles.en: The Witch at the End of the World
alternative_titles.ja: 世界の終わりの魔法使い

synopsis:
In the end of the world, the wizard-fairy Ann and the science boy Mugi meet!

Hollow memories, demon forests, and secrets of the world. The first fantasy story series that spreads around the forbidden magic 'shadow'.

Everything started here. Pooh!

alternative_titles.en: Things to do - I Started a Handmade Life.
alternative_titles.ja: ものつく～手作り生活、はじめました。～

title: Boku to Imouto
synopsis:
"Me and Lil Sis" is a long happy story about a sister and brother, and their school friend having fun on a daily basis.

What can be worse than a horny sister? Yes, a horny futa sister. :)

title: Wakaba Hanafubuki
synopsis:
Wakaba is the only daughter of an ancient ninja family, but she can't stand the ninja world. Nevertheless, she is told to choose from among five potential husbands and carry on the family tradition.
(Source: Mangaguide)

title: Haai Step Jun

alternative_titles.ja: はーいステップジュン

synopsis:
Jun is an intelligent and resourceful girl who spends her time creating all kinds of inventions. She creates a robot, Kichinosuke, who follows her everywhere and becomes her close friend.
She falls in love with Zero, a motorcycle enthusiast who prefers to travel the roads rather than study. Their mutual love of mechanical objects brings them closer together and Jun is determined to have Zero as her boyfriend.
Unfortunately for Jun, he doesn’t even seem to notice her feelings!

(Source: MangaDex)

title: Uchikyaba: Ouchi de Cabaret Club shite Niichan wo Onnanoko ni Naresaseyou Daisakusen

synonyms: Home Cabaret: Operation: Making a Cabaret Club at Home so Niichan Can Get Used to Girls
alternative_titles.ja: ウチキャバ ～お家でキャバクラして兄ちゃんを女の子になれさせよう大作戦～

synopsis:
Minato Anjou, 24 years old, is good at his work and people have high expectations for him. At this rate, climbing the corporate ladder will be smooth sailing! ...or so it seems. Minato actually has a huge problem! He can't talk to girls at all, even to the point of affecting his work. It was only when his senpai from work invited him out to a cabaret club that his life began to change! Thus begins the story of a loser's journey into the next-gen cabaret club!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Sonoki ni Saseruna!
synopsis: The continuing adventures of Hinata and Seshir.

title: Hagure Yuusha no Isekai Bible: Isekai de Ecchi Manga Egaitetara, Seishozukai Toshite Agamerareteiru Ken Nitsuite.

alternative_titles.ja: はぐれ勇者の異世界バイブル ～異世界でえちえち漫画描いてたら、聖書遣いとして崇められている件について。～

title: Oiroke Tantou no Ane to, Higo Yoku Tantou no Imouto ni Hasamereta Watashi

alternative_titles.ja: お色気担当の姉と、庇護欲担当の妹に挟まれた私

title: Sensha de Hoihoi
synopsis:
When a comet strikes the earth and a mysterious disease starts to kill off humanity, bugs rise from the earth and begin the extermination of mankind. Now it's up to those left alive to fight back against the horde. 

(Source: M-U)

title: Sono Munou, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Mahoutsukai: Munou to Sagesumare, Kizokuka kara Oidasareta ga, Gift "Tenseisha" ga Kakusei shite Zense no Nouryoku ga Yomigaetta

alternative_titles.ja: その無能、実は世界最強の魔法使い　〜無能と蔑まれ、貴族家から追い出されたが、ギフト《転生者》が覚醒して前世の能力が蘇った〜

title: Seirei Gakusha Kidan Reikyou Kaden

alternative_titles.ja: 精霊学者綺談 黎鏡花伝

synopsis:
Yuika Aoi has a recurring nightmare in which she isn’t able to save a mysterious, green-eyed man called Rei. Her elderly grandmother, who was born in the Taisho era, lives very traditionally, and at times seems to have magical powers. Apart from all this, she is a normal high school girl until she falls off a roof and into the Taisho era, in the middle of a battle between Rei and a fairy. Will she be able to save him this time?

(Source: Doko Demo Doa Manga Scanlations)

title: Maneki Neko Jinja no Tenteko Mai na Hibi

alternative_titles.en: The Fortune Cat Shrine's Hectic Days
alternative_titles.ja: 招き猫神社のテンテコ舞いな日々

synopsis:
After the company he established went bankrupt and he was left with nothing but the clothes on his back, Kazumi Iwakura comes to a small shrine at the far end of Tokyo to become its caretaker. However, upon arriving, he finds three cats who have called the shrine their home; a big, ugly ginger tabby and two furball-like gray kittens, one a gray-she and the other a gray-he.

As it turns out, they are bakeneko (cats that turned into youkai) and can change into human forms; the tabby into a handsome man with a death glare, and the two kittens into twins about three years of age...

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)

title: The Ashen Snowfield
synopsis:
The world didn't end with a bang. It was a flash of light bookended by a long, endless freeze that covered the landscape in white snow. Kindness and compassion were replaced with struggle and the ruthless will to survive. And then, there are the Ashen. New beings with abilities beyond that of normal humans, giving them an edge above all others in the frozen wasteland. In this war, there are no victors, just survivors.

(Source: Lezhin Comics)

title: Yasha
synopsis:
There were once two demons who carried bows on their backs and had sharp swords in their hands. When their eyes turned black, they swallowed the darkness and the people. All that was left was black blood, and the only thing they were afraid of was the yomizakura. With their bodies badly damaged, they chased after a person who could not be killed forever. 

(Source: Mellylemon)

title: Imouto Tarumono: Ecchi Imouto wa Suki desu ka? - Anthology Comic

alternative_titles.ja: 妹たるもの ～えっちぃ妹はスキですか？～ アンソロジーコミック

synopsis: An anthology about younger sisters.

title: This Isn't It
synopsis:
Ro-ah Kim is the manager for the famous actor, Sih-Yeon Chen, who mistreats her. When fatigue hits due to overwork, Ro-ah gets into an accident and dies. In her dying moment filled with revenge, she swears if she could return to the past she would trample all over Sih-Yeon to prevent him from becoming famous. It turns out that she actually did return to the past, just in time before Sih-Yeon is about to make his debut. Ro-ah tries to sabotage Sih-Yeon's career, however her plan is not turning out as smoothly as she expects it to be.

(Source: Naver Corporation, translated)

title: Chima-chan no Wadansu
synopsis: One day, college student Asako, who has always lived by fitting in, decides that she wants to wear kimono, and joins a mysterious club called Wanomichi Club. When Asako meets the quirky Manager and Mr. Mitsumoto, and they nickname her Chima.

title: Kare no Jiyuu ni Kansuru Kenkyuu

alternative_titles.ja: 彼の自由に関する研究

title: Seigi!!
synopsis: In a distant future, Natsuzawa Natsu and Morizaki Yuki are two reckless and unlucky police girls who get into a mess everyday. Their department was about to add mecha soldiers into the force, but everything goes wrong when these robots start going berserk. Now, they must solve the case while dealing with a shady organization known as the Dark Devils, composed by people with unnatural powers and abilities.

title: Suishou no Hibiki
synopsis:
Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Suishou no Oto

alternative_titles.ja: 真夜中は女神 ―寝取られ性転換―

title: Paris no Suzukike
synopsis:
Hiroya Suzuki is a young boy of 13 who lives in Japan. His father was transferred to a subsidiary of his company in Paris, and takes his whole family with him - for them it is the beginning of a great adventure. 
Along with the new language he'll have to learn, getting used to a totally different lifestyle could well be the greatest challenge. 
(Translated from amazon.fr).

Release information and alternative synopsis (from the Japanese version) can be found under More Info.

alternative_titles.ja: 熱愛 南国王子のシンデレラ

title: Novel: Kamen Rider Ex-Aid: ~Mighty Novel X~

synonyms: Shōsetsu Kamen Raidā Eguzeido 〜Maiti Noberu Ekkusu〜
alternative_titles.en: Novel: Kamen Rider Ex-Aid: ~Mighty Novel X~
alternative_titles.ja: 小説 仮面ライダーエグゼイド 〜マイティノベルX〜

synopsis: Emu Hojo receives an unidentified package, containing a Gashat called "Mighty Novel X".

title: Iki Okure Seijo no Shiawase: Konyaku Haki sareta to Omottara Mazoku no Ouji-sama ni Dekiai saretemasu!

synonyms: The Happiness of the Old Miss Saint
alternative_titles.en: The Saint's Belated Happiness: Newly Single, Now Living with the Demon Prince
alternative_titles.ja: 行き遅れ聖女の幸せ～婚約破棄されたと思ったら魔族の皇子様に溺愛されてます!～

synopsis:
"Well, what do you expect? You're twenty-seven years old now."

Saint Marialite can't believe her ears when her fiancé, the crown prince, breaks off their engagement due to her age. She doesn't let that get her down, though; considering the hardship she has endured over the past few years, her mental fortitude allows her to calmly accept the prince's decision and return home. However, when she gets there, she finds...a boy with horns?! The demon prince grows at an unbelievable speed, and in no time at all, he falls head over heels in love with Marialite. Now, he's determined to bring her back to his own country! What might bloom between the easygoing saint and the naïve demon prince in this romantic fantasy?

(Source: Cross Infinite World)

alternative_titles.ja: ワールドワーストワン

title: 15-sai, Kyou kara Dousei Hajimemasu.

alternative_titles.en: 15 Years Old: Starting Today We'll Be Living Together

synopsis:
"I was planning for us to stay just friends... but I'm not holding back anymore." I'm living with my childhood friend turned savage! My heart won't stop throbbing as each day passes and he just won't give up...!! After entering high school, Hiyori is finally able to fulfill her dream of living alone. Or so she thought... Her childhood friend Soushi is there waiting for her at her new apartment. He suddenly kisses her and Hiyori is unable to hide her confusion. Is he teasing her? Or is this for real...? For the first time, she begins to see Soushi, who she'd never paid too much attention to before, as a man. At the age of 15, Hiyori begins her radical, new life living with Soushi!

(Source: Renta!)

title: Shishosei
synopsis:
A tower containing all the books of a kingdom. On it is the librarian, the lord of the collection tower. The librarian existed only to be used by the Great King as a tool. The story of Shishosei begins when a barbaric girl named Millet is selected as the new librarian's maiden.

(Source: MU)

title: Rulia Nya!!
synopsis:
Rulia-nya!! is a 4-koma series about a foreign exchange student Rulia and her everyday life with her classmates.

(Source: MU)

title: Imouto no Nureta Kuchibiru
synopsis: Anthology of one-shots by various mangaka dealing with little sisters.

title: Boku de Mitashite
synopsis:
Noah, a wolf with no family, was banished from his pack—the only place he ever belonged to—due to his omega nature. He arrives in an herbivorous beastmen village where he meets Henri, a rabbit who lives alone with his little brothers.

Henri hides Noah because there is still prejudice against carnivores in his village. He is touched by Noah's gentle and caring nature and gradually begins to envision a future in which they become a family.

However, Noah's heat awakens Henri's alpha sexual instincts...!

(Source: Shu-Cream)

title: Tensei shita Moto Dorei, Saikyou no Kizoku ni Natte Toshiue no Musume to Sekai Saikyou wo Mezashimasu

alternative_titles.en: Died a Slave, Reborn a Noble: Becoming the Strongest with a Daughter Who's Older Than Me
alternative_titles.ja: 転生した元奴隷、最強の貴族になって年上の娘と世界最強を目指します

synopsis:
The arena—a place where slaves are forced to fight to death. Lewis was one such slave who lost his life in a match. But when he opened his eyes again, he found himself in the garden of a luxurious mansion. Much to his surprise, Lewis reincarnated as the sixth son of a nobleman. One day, more than ten years after his reincarnation, Lewis meets a fellow slave and friend from his previous life, Sharon. But while Lewis knew Sharon as child, she now appears in front of him as a lady older than Lewis himself.

(Source: Square Enix)

title: Nyotai-ka Otome no Renai Jijou

synonyms: Nyotai-ka Musume to Hoshizora no Kokuhaku
Orera no Head wa Nyotai-ka Yankee
A Gender-Bent Maiden and a Confession Under a Starry Sky
alternative_titles.en: The Love Affairs of a Feminized Maiden
alternative_titles.ja: 女体化乙女の恋愛事情

synopsis:
1. Nyotai-ka Musume to Hoshizora no Kokuhaku (A Gender-Bent Maiden and a Confession Under a Starry Sky)
2. Nyotai-ka Otome no Renai Jijou (The Love Affairs of a Genderswapped Maiden)
3. Junan Junan (A Bestowed Woman's Ordeal)
4. Orera no Head wa Nyotai-ka Yankee (Our Chief's a Feminized Delinquent)
5. Kakioroshi

title: Youfu wo Enjite
synopsis: Supermodel Lydia took part in a fashion show organized for a charity for disadvantaged children. But the money from the show disappeared, and it was Lydia's mother who stole the money! Lydia cannot accept that this is what happened, even after being investigated by the police...because she blames herself for her mother's unhappiness. It is the wealthy Christiano who lends Lydia a helping hand in her time of need. Although his intentions are to spend the night with her! (Mangafox)

title: Denpa na Megami no Iru Nichijou

alternative_titles.ja: 電波な女神のいる日常

title: Jibun Kaigi
synopsis: A young man ends up impoverished living in the house he once saw as a kid, there he meets his future selves who meet to talk about their lives.

title: Akan!! Mou Muchakucha ni Shite

alternative_titles.ja: アカン!! もうむちゃくちゃにして

synopsis:
1-2. Eats In
3. Toaru Nichijou no Fuukei
4. Hey Mama
5. Katekyo: Natsu Monogatari
6. Mahou Gakuen Shangri-La Dee Da (Magic School Shangri-La Dee Da)
7. Izakaya Chiemi
8. Rairai! China Kaasan

synonyms: I want to be your real mom
alternative_titles.ja: あなたのママになりたくて

title: Hana to Unmei Chuudoku
synopsis:
Yoshida Hana has only one goal in life: to find her soul mate.Dreamy, distracted and hopeful, she wishes to find someone to share those feelings with; although she has no luck. After several failed love affairs, she does not lose sight of her ideal and share that desire with others. Therefore, she doesn't bother trying to convince her subordinate, Takada, that soul mates do exist and that he will find his someday... something Takada is not really interested in, nor does he believe they exist. In this unique senpai-subordinate relationship there is something that none of them dare to say out loud, until one day they meet outside of work at Takada's house... Pancakes and a hidden longing, what will happen between Hana and Takada in an unexpected night?

Source: MU

title: Bokutachi no Sono e Youkoso

synonyms: Ore no Yuujin no Shoutai na noda ga...
Boku no Sono e Youkoso: Zero
alternative_titles.ja: 僕たちの園へようこそ

synopsis:
1. Boku no Sono e Youkoso
2. Idol no Iroha
3. Boku shika Shiranai
4. Wakaranai Koto wa Tameshite Miyou☆
5. Danshiryou to Romance
6. Joshiryoku!
7. Ore no Yuujin no Shoutai na noda ga...
8. Otokonoko Onnanoko
9. Kagami no Kuni no Boku
10. Milk no Jitsu
11. Boku no Sono e Youkoso: Zero

title: Kotei no Himawari
synopsis:
The manga centers on a magazine journalist named Takurou. A place that Takurou used to live in was flooded and became a lake due to a dam being constructed nearby. However, an extended drought period dried up the lake, and Takurou heads to his old, recently-emerged home.

(Source: ANN)

title: Renjo no Hokorobi

synonyms: Love Coming Apart at the Seams

synopsis: Published in Comic Anthurium 2021-02

title: Akai Hana
synopsis: Yuu is dating Yusuke who lives with Hazuki. Whenever Yuu visits their place, she finds herself getting closer and closer to Hazuki. What will happen?

title: Concierge Imperial

alternative_titles.ja: コンシェルジュ インペリアル

synopsis:
Yuna Mogami, the daughter of a legendary hotel concierge, starts working as a care-worker at a nursing home for the elderly—which seems like a nightmare at first. People living out their final years must confront all sorts of personal and family issues—Yuna is under heavy pressure to provide the ultimate service: "Attending people on their deathbeds" and "Making sure their final moments are happy ones." Can she deliver her imperial hospitality, for the sake of the people in need——?!

(Source: Silent Manga Audition)

synonyms: Sexual Love With Mother and Daughter

title: Yuri's Palace
synopsis:
In the Sun Empire, only women can be the ruling monarch. In this world, Emperor Yuri, who doesn't believe in love, struggles to stabilize her hold on the throne. Meanwhile, her treacherous husband aspires to become emperor himself. Seeing through his intent, Yuri decides to take in other consorts. While looking for candidates, she comes across former Prince Doha. He tells her that he believes in true love and that he doesn't hate anyone. Intrigued, Yuri decides to invite him to the palace. What does she want? And will she be able to gain a firmer foothold on the throne?

(Source: Tappytoon)

title: Studio Pulp
synopsis:
Yakushamaru Hiroko has big plans for herself, and she's come to Studio Pulp, the home of the stars, to make them a reality. However, there seems to be some kind of misunderstanding.

(Source: MU)

title: Yuri☆Kome
synopsis:
Natural airhead Chiho Sakuranaga entered an all girl's high school due to a misunderstanding. Before the entrance ceremony she ran into a puzzling, but beautiful boy-like girl. Later the school president smiles at her and she can't stop the sudden pounding in her chest. Though self-proclaimed straight thus begins her yuri life.

(Source: MU)

title: Don't Trust the Female Lead
synopsis:
Susan is the perfect and sweet female lead–or so the novel says. Because of this, the newly possessed Lady Medena Rodenherg doesn't think twice about supporting the protagonist on her journey. However, the story Medena knows isn't the entire truth, and Susan is actually far from the kind girl she's been portrayed to be on the pages. This becomes most apparent when she ultimately betrays Medena and has her unjustly executed.

Now back in time before ever meeting Susan, Medena decides to take the opposite approach in this life and team up with the novel's antagonist, Pharren. Lucky for her, Pharren may not entirely be the wicked villain Medena has read about in the original novel...

(Source: Tappytoon)

title: Babysitting the Male Lead

synonyms: I Will Temporarily Protect the Male Lead

synopsis:
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

(Source: Tapas Media)

title: Gokukou Senki Mistletear: Sasagerareta Henshin Heroine

alternative_titles.ja: 極煌戦姫ミストルティア 捧げられた変身ヒロイン

title: Otona ni Nattara Bijin ni Naru Ko-chan

synonyms: Otonaninattara Bijinninaruko-chan, The Girl That Will Grow to be a Beauty
alternative_titles.ja: 大人になったら美人になる子ちゃん

synopsis:
A sweet and short one-shot about our heroine, Houjou Mirei's heartwarming attempts in earning her classmates' recognition.

(Source: Mangadex)

title: Sakura, Sakimashita.: Last Springtime of Life

alternative_titles.ja: さくら、咲きました。　Last Springtime of Life

synopsis:
The year is 2238 and due to newfound technology, humans now can choose not to grow old. It is a world of eternal life. Tsubasa readied himself for another school year, the only difference this year being that the swimming club he was part of had been disbanded. His childhood friend Tsubame encouraged him to join the life club, a peculiar club dedicated to searching for ‘life energy’. While he wasn’t sure what that meant, he ended up joining anyway. The club spends its days digging for treasure, eating desserts at Shitoran-tei and running a cosplay fashion show. Most of it was quite random, but it was quite enjoyable. After another day out with Tsubame, he returned home where the streets were eerily quiet. There was a special TV broadcast announcing that there was an asteroid headed on a collision course to Earth and that there was practically no chance of survival.

(Source: Hau~ Omochikaeri)

title: Gokubuto♡Insert
synopsis:
1-2. Kashikiri Daiyokujou
3. Otonari Otomari
4-5. Houkago Lesson
6. Rinkan Kimodameshi
7. Pai Kano
8. Koibito Engi

title: Dorei Elf-chan wo Eiyuu ni Produce Shimasu! Gakeppuchi kara Hajimeru Sekai Jumyou no Nobashikata

alternative_titles.ja: 奴隷エルフちゃんを英雄にプロデュースします! 崖っぷちから始める世界寿命の延ばし方

title: Torikago no Himegimi: Zankoku na Kishi no Mekurumeku Yoru

alternative_titles.ja: 鳥籠の姫君～残酷な騎士のめくるめく夜～

title: Senka no Maihime
synopsis:
Once upon a time, our world was blessed by the Valkyrie, a goddess of war whose fleeting beauty shone brilliantly on the battlefield. Her campaign against the wretched Demon King proved victorious, with the evil being sealed away by the beautiful warrior.

Many years later, the young King Alnoa has just returned home after staving off another invasion of his homeland. Before he can even change out of his battle attire, his sister Cecilia comes to him with startling news: Sharon and Lesfina, both princesses and Divas blessed with the power of the Valkyrie, seek his hand in marriage.

﻿﻿Alnoa isn't fond of the idea, but his feelings mean little in the face of politics. He arranges to meet them one month apart and will choose one to be his bride, ushering in a new era for his kingdom.

Now it's time for our young king to meet the first candidate. He awaits her at the castle gates... But wait! Both candidates showed up at the same time!?

(Source: Sol Press)

alternative_titles.ja: カラスのいとし京都めし

synopsis:
Legend says there lives a crow who could speak... but the legend never mentioned how much this crow loves to eat human food?! Karasuma "Karasu" descends to the world of humans and is driven by his longing to eat good food—he even picks up a part-time job to pay for his food cravings. Karasuma, in his human form, visits restaurants, cafes, and eateries all around Kyoto and falls in love over and over with all the different meals and dishes he encounters. Follow Karasuma as he introduces and devours all the fine cuisines that Kyoto has to offer.

synopsis:
Third year editor Takahiro Tsukamoto spends most of his time reading novels by Itsuki Setoguchi. Takahiro is in charge of Itsuki while his senior is on his maternity leave. However, what was supposed to be the best time has turned into something else due to his new neighbor. Their first impressions of each other were the worst, yet they also both find out that they are actually rivals in love! Under such circumstances, Takahiro couldn’t believe who appeared during his meeting with Setoguchi-sensei!

(Source: Media Soft, translated)

Once they undeniably experience paranormal activity of any form, this series will come to an abrupt end. Their love for ghosts and demons are unmatched by their peers, but will they ever be able to encounter any?

Suzu's dream is to become an assistant to her beloved writer, Kyousuke Sasaki. While she's looking for him all over, she gets a job as an assistant to another novelist, also named Kyousuke. Their turbulent relationship is riddled with misunderstandings and secrets, but their passion burns like fire.

synopsis:
Fuji's high school kendo team has an embarrassing losing streak, but things start to turn around as they suddenly begin winning most of their matches and even qualify for nationals. The secret is the arrival of their new team manager, a girl who uses her perfect looks to seduce the members of Fuji's kendo team. The manager manipulates the boys by taking advantage of their sexual fetishes, implying that she is willing to indulge their desires in order to unlock a monstrous potential in their kendo abilities. Fuji stands against this immoral method, but he comes to learn that there may be more to his manager than he first thought.

For one month, Keel is a live-in prostitute for Seiji and fulfills all of his requests, even requests to have Keel dress as a girl and top him. Keel grins and bears it since he is being paid good money. But, even though their relationship starts with a contract, what will happen when emotions become involved?

Shouko, however is a white fox, and the princess of the white fox clan no less. As their relationship mixes magical and monstrous powers with divination, a totally new kind of magical light is born. In spite of the worry people around her feel, Liliana is overjoyed and says, "Please love me forever." When she writes a very long love letter, people suspect it's a cipher, but it looks like they met in a dream before...? 

At the same time, the equilibrium with the two neighboring countries is about to collapse. What will happen to this newlywed couple who are at odds with each other?

synopsis:
This is Hisaya Nakajo's first tankoubon, and it contains 4 one-shot complete stories. The first one takes up most of the volume, while the other 3 are much shorter and finish off the book. The main story, 'Yume Miru Happa,' is about a country girl named Futaba who moves into a building in the city where she gets free rent in exchange for some light cooking and cleaning. She is in the city to go to school, somethings her parents wanted her to do. Futaba quickly becomes entangled in the relationship between Zakuru, the guy who she lives with and is doing the cooking for, and his friend Masato. Masato is very nice to Futaba, but what is his relationship with Zakuru? The next story is about a 17 year old tomboy named Natsume who realizes she has feelings for a childhood friend of hers. But the fact that she has always been a tomboy seems to make up a lot of her worries. The last 2 stories are also great high school romances.

This year, everyone knows the team captainship is between the great players Namikawa and Yokosuka. However, the faculty advisor of the baseball club decides this year to choose a captain instead of taking a vote from the players. Based on a desire to involve Kazumasa more in the team (due in large part to a visit from Kazumasa's mother), he chooses Kazumasa as the captain. The other players are shocked and disappointed, but Kazumasa doesn't want to refuse the captainship and quit the club. Will he be able to rise to the challenge?

The Golden Phoenix, The Silver Phoenix - A princess longs for a lost love and almost loses her life until a mysterious exorcist opens her heart and mind to the truth and to what has been right in front of her all along.

The Hime with the Flower Crown - A young princess learns with the help of a mysterious young boy that putting away childish things may ultimately lead to a fulfilling new world and to the fulfilment of her beloved father's wish.

Memories of a Flower - While trying to solve the mystery behind the ghostly apparition of his beloved princess, a young man learns to ease his own sadness. (Source: M-U)
